features: 【AODK L Shaped Design】The L-shaped computer desk (55"W * 31.5" D * 28.9" H) with file cabinet (16.9"W * 18.5" D * 25.3" H). The desk' total length IS 72 Inch.The unique corner desk design fits perfectly in your bedroom, study, living room, playroom and children's room, maximizing the use of limited space, and it will be a beautiful decoration for your room, and it can also be a great gift for your own friends and loved ones!

【Super Large Storage Space】Our AODK L shaped desk is coming with 6-tier easy to assemble fabric drawers, a cabinet with printer stand and 2 open shelves, which gives you plenty of under-table storage space to help you store your books, work files and small office supplies to make your work and study more efficient.

【Health-friendly Monitor Stand Design】: The monitor stand conforms to the ergonomic sturcture, which can effectively reduces the pressure on your back and neck, elevate your line of sight, allowing you to maintain proper sitting posture and protect your cervical and spinal health.

【2 USB Charging Ports & 3 Power Outlets】Our L shaped computer desk are equipped with2 USB charging ports & 3 power outlets for your electronic devices, you can easily and conveniently charge your smart phone, laptop, gaming gear and other office devices when you are working or playing games.

【Easy Assembly & AODK Professional after-sales team】The corner desk come with detailed instructions, all parts are clearly labeled, the only thing you need to do is following instructions step-by-step. If AODK L-shaped desk arrives damaged, missing part or scratched, please feel free to contact us, our professional customer support team will help you solve the problem within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This desk was well packaged to prevent damage during shipping. It was very easy to assemble and all the tools needed were provided. The directions were very easy to follow. I really like that it has built in usb ports along with electrical outlets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to order this desk because the price was so good! But when it came, it was easy to assemble, good quality and it looks great in our space! Very happy with my purchase and I want another one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Compact Desk For Small Spaces But Not Adjustable
reviews.reviewText: I need to replace a large L shaped desk with a smaller desk to fit moving into a smaller space in my home. I chose this one because it offered more drawers and a built in printer table that most desks do not. I was losing my separate matching printer stand with the former desk and the former desk had no drawers other then the one on the separate printer stand. This new desk had to fit in a specific area and had to hold everything from the much larger former desk. Here is why it doesn't get 5 stars: In the description it says the desk is adjustable. In the pictures, it shows a version of the desk with the L table clearly to the left of the desk chair. This leads you to believe that the L shaped desk can be assembled with the L table to the right or left of the user. This is not the case. In the instructions, there is no option for changing which side the L shape desk is on. After a few hours of trying to devise a way to do this, I found that the hardware locations on the main desk could not be optioned for the L shaped desk to be to my left as I greatly needed. Even if I would have modified the hardware locations, this would have made the drawer sliders backwards or upside down. The "adjustable" description and pictures are a false selling point. I also ran across one joint (part D to part E) that was not drilled all of the way through, but that was a very easy fix. Using a 4mm T handle Allen type wrench will increase the speed of assembly. However, there is some hardware that can only be tightened with the Allen type provided. The instructions say not to use a power tool, but it could be done if you are not a moron and understand to use a very low setting as the box channel framing can easily be crushed. At the end of the day, I did get the desk to fit in the space, but not ideally. The drawers are fabric and the drawer fronts tend to not stay vertical when closed all of the way. This is just a mention if that matters to you, but does not matter in my case because the desk is only seen by me in a private room. I did get everything from the larger desk to have it's place on or in this desk. It's a tight fit, but it is workable and what I needed. After assembly the desk does seem sturdy though it is definitely not a lifetime piece of fine show furniture. However, it is fitting my needs as a very nice temporary station until the house remodel is finished and then I will upgrade to an executive desk. Overall, I am happy that it fits my current needs and the quality seems to be a fit for useability for a number of years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well-Made, Sturdy, Stylish, Functional!
reviews.reviewText: At 68, I've finally upgraded from using my lap and makeshift dresser as a computer desk. My spouse and I, both retired, found ourselves in the midst of an unexpected move to a much smaller home, and this ADOK L shaped computer desk will fit perfectly in the small den/guest bedroom once we finally move. My son-in-law recently assembled it for me, and said the assembly was easy thanks to clear instructions, all parts clearly labeled, and all necessary tools included. I'm overjoyed with this lovely desk. It's not just sturdy and well-made; it's a perfect solution for all my storage needs with large space and 6-tier fabric drawers. Fabric feels strong and durable, and file drawer design make organizing a joy. I love that it's equipped with 2 USB charging ports and 3 power outlets for all my electronic devices. The desk's height is perfect and comfortable, and the health-friendly monitor stand is a bonus. It's not just functional; it's a beautiful addition to my workspace, and it will look perfect with my white/black office chair I recently purchased. I love it and can't wait to use it once we move and my desk is in place - I will update with pictures. Reasonably priced and great investment. Highly recommended 👌

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very spacious and well built for what it is. Assembly was simple. The drawers are fabric so they won't hold much weight but again, good for what it is. You can store a lot of things on and inside the desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent looking modern desk with plent of storage and power
reviews.reviewText: The AODK 72" L Shaped Computer Desk with 5 Fabric Drawers & File Cabinet & USB Power Outlets, Corner Desk with Printer Stand& Monitor Shelf, Large Work Desk for Home Office, Black is an excellent upgrade to the office space.Features:Large L-shaped design: Offers ample workspace for multiple monitors, computers, and office supplies, although I do wish it was a bit deeper.5 fabric drawers and file cabinet: Provide plenty of storage for documents, books, and office essentials.USB power outlets and charging ports: Keep your devices powered up and conveniently within reach.Printer stand and monitor shelf: Dedicated space for your printer and additional storage or display.Black finish: Offers a stylish and modern look that complements various decors.Durable construction: Aims to withstand the wear and tear of daily use.Assembly: It took me about 2.5 hours to assemble it, there are lots of parts and hardware, but it was pretty straightforward with the included directions.The AODK 72" L-Shaped Computer Desk offers a spacious and stylish solution for your home office needs. This solution works very well in my space to meet my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Streamlined my office—the clear instructions put IKEA to shame!
reviews.reviewText: I won't lie, this was a LOT of work to put together, not to mention the additional work it took to move everything from my old desk to this new one, but it was so worth it. The instructions were in crystal clear English and all the parts were there, including all the necessary tools. After using an old repurposed IKEA desk for so many years, this thing feels so streamlined. It's less cluttered because there is actually a built-in place to put my dual monitors and printer, and some drawers to put things (my IKEA desk didn't have any of this). My only concern is that the drawers are fabric, similar to those fabric IKEA cubes, and I don't know how well they will hold up over time. For now, though, this is a much better workspace for me in my home office. The only big adjustment is how close I am to my monitors now, as they were set farther back on my old desk, but I'm getting used to it.
